languages.text: Мо{mf|й|я} влады{mf|ка|чица}, со скорбью свидетельствую о гибели 27.61% священных машинных духов, доверенных моей опеке. Экстренному погребению подвергнуты второй и третий реакторы, экипаж палубы приступил к поминальному бдению. {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}Сервиторы{/g} зафиксировали не менее одиннадцати пробоин во внешнем корпусе, не менее трех — во внутреннем корпусе. С вашего милостивого дозволения, я приступаю к спасению того, что еще может быть спасено. {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссия{/g} знает все, постигает все.

traits.locale_text: Мо{mf|й|я} влады{mf|ка|чица}, со скорбью свидетельствую о гибели 27.61% священных Машинных духов, доверенных моей опеке. Экстренному погребению подвергнуты второй и третий реакторы, экипаж палубы приступил к поминальному бдению. Сервиторы зафиксировали не менее одиннадцати пробоин во внешнем корпусе, не менее трех — во внутреннем корпусе. С вашего милостивого дозволения, я приступаю к спасению того, что еще может быть спасено. Омниссия знает все, постигает все.

languages.text: My {mf|lord|lady}, it grieves me to report the demise of 27.61% of the blessed machine spirits entrusted to my care. Reactors 2 and 3 required expedited burials, and the deck's crew held a vigil in their memory. The {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitors{/g} have logged at least eleven breaches in the hull exterior, and at least three in the hull interior. With my {mf|lord|lady}'s gracious permission, I will endeavour to save what can still be saved. The {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} knows all, comprehends all.
languages.original_text: Мо{mf|й|я} влады{mf|ка|чица}, со скорбью свидетельствую о гибели 27.61% священных машинных духов, доверенных моей опеке. Экстренному погребению подвергнуты второй и третий реакторы, экипаж палубы приступил к поминальному бдению. {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}Сервиторы{/g} зафиксировали не менее одиннадцати пробоин во внешнем корпусе, не менее трех — во внутреннем корпусе. С вашего милостивого дозволения, я приступаю к спасению того, что еще может быть спасено. {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссия{/g} знает все, постигает все.

traits.locale_text: My {mf|lord|lady}, it grieves me to report the demise of 27.61% of the blessed Machine Spirits entrusted to my care. Reactors 2 and 3 required expedited burials, and the deck's crew held a vigil in their memory. The servitors have logged at least eleven breaches in the hull exterior, and at least three in the hull interior. With my {mf|lord|lady}'s gracious permission, I will endeavor to save what can still be saved. The Omnissiah knows all, comprehends all.

Reactors 2 and 3 required expedited burials, and the deck's crew held a vigil in their memory. The servitors have logged at least eleven breaches in the hull exterior, and at least three in the hull interior. With my {mf|lord|lady}'s gracious permission, I will endeavor to save what can still be saved. The Omnissiah knows all, comprehends all.

Reactors 2 and 3 required expedited burials, and the deck's crew held a vigil in their memory. The servitors have logged at least eleven breaches in the hull exterior, and at least three in the hull interior. With my {mf|lord|lady}'s gracious permission, I will endeavor to save what can still be saved. The Omnissiah knows all, comprehends all.

My {mf|lord|lady}, it grieves me to report the demise of 27.61% of the blessed machine spirits entrusted to my care. Reactors 2 and 3 required expedited burials, and the deck's crew held a vigil in their memory. The {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitors{/g} have logged at least eleven breaches in the hull exterior, and at least three in the hull interior. With my {mf|lord|lady}'s gracious permission, I will endeavour to save what can still be saved. The {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} knows all, comprehends all.

languages.text: Mi{mf|lord|lady}, lamento informar de la muerte de un 27,61 % de los espíritus máquina a mi cargo. Ha sido necesario celebrar un entierro acelerado para los reactores 2 y 3 y la tripulación de la cubierta ha participado en su funeral. Los {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servidores{/g} han registrado al menos once brechas en el exterior del casco y tres más en el interior. Con su permiso, haré lo que pueda para salvar todo lo salvable. El {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} lo sabe todo y lo comprende todo.
languages.original_text: My {mf|lord|lady}, it grieves me to report the demise of 27.61% of the blessed machine spirits entrusted to my care. Reactors 2 and 3 required expedited burials, and the deck's crew held a vigil in their memory. The {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitors{/g} have logged at least eleven breaches in the hull exterior, and at least three in the hull interior. With my {mf|lord|lady}'s gracious permission, I will endeavour to save what can still be saved. The {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} knows all, comprehends all.

traits.locale_text: Mi{mf|lord|lady}, lamento informar de la muerte de un 27,61 % de los espíritus máquina a mi cargo. Ha sido necesario celebrar un entierro acelerado para los reactores 2 y 3 y la tripulación de la cubierta ha participado en su funeral. Los {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servidores{/g} han registrado al menos once brechas en el exterior del casco y tres más en el interior. Con su permiso, haré lo que pueda para salvar todo lo salvable. El {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} lo ve todo y lo comprende todo.

languages.text: {mf|大人|大人}，我很悲痛地告知您，在我负责的受祝福的机魂之中，有27.61%的机魂已经陨灭。2号与3号反应堆进行了加速安葬，甲板上的船员们已经为机魂们守过灵了。{g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}机仆{/g}们记录了至少十一处舰体外部破损与至少三处内部破损。如果您允许，{mf|大人|大人}，我将尽我所能，努力挽救尚能挽救的东西。{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}无所不知，无所不晓。
languages.original_text: My {mf|lord|lady}, it grieves me to report the demise of 27.61% of the blessed machine spirits entrusted to my care. Reactors 2 and 3 required expedited burials, and the deck's crew held a vigil in their memory. The {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitors{/g} have logged at least eleven breaches in the hull exterior, and at least three in the hull interior. With my {mf|lord|lady}'s gracious permission, I will endeavour to save what can still be saved. The {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} knows all, comprehends all.

traits.locale_text: {mf|大人|大人}，我很悲痛地告知您，在我负责的受祝福的机魂之中，有27.61%的机魂已经陨灭。2号与3号反应堆进行了加速安葬，甲板上的船员们已经为机魂们守过灵了。{g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}奴工{/g}们记录了至少十一处舰体外部破损与至少三处内部破损。如果您允许，{mf|大人|大人}，我将尽我所能，努力挽救尚能挽救的东西。{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}无所不知，无所不晓。

languages.text: 陛下、悲しいお知らせなのですが、管理を任されていた祝福されし機械精霊の27.61%が命を落としました。 2番原子炉と3番原子炉はすぐに埋葬が必要で、デッキのクルーは追悼の祈りを捧げました。{g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}サーヴィター{/g}達は船体の外側に少なくとも11件、船体の内部に少なくとも3件の破損を記録しています。あなたの寛大な許可を得て、まだ救えるものを救うために尽力する所存です。{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}はすべを知り、すべてを包む。
languages.original_text: My {mf|lord|lady}, it grieves me to report the demise of 27.61% of the blessed machine spirits entrusted to my care. Reactors 2 and 3 required expedited burials, and the deck's crew held a vigil in their memory. The {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitors{/g} have logged at least eleven breaches in the hull exterior, and at least three in the hull interior. With my {mf|lord|lady}'s gracious permission, I will endeavour to save what can still be saved. The {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} knows all, comprehends all.

traits.locale_text: 陛下、悲しいお知らせなのですが、管理を任されていた祝福されし機械精霊の27.61%が命を落としました。 2番原子炉と3番原子炉はすぐに埋葬が必要で、デッキのクルーは追悼の祈りを捧げました。{g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}サーヴィター{/g}達は船体の外側に少なくとも11件、船体の内部に少なくとも3件の破損を記録しています。あなたの寛大な許可を得て、まだ救えるものを救うために尽力する所存です。{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}はすべを知り、すべてを包む。

languages.text: Mein Herr, es betrübt mich, das Ableben von 27,61% der mir anvertrauten gesegneten Maschinengeister zu vermelden. Die Reaktoren 2 und 3 mussten im Eiltempo beerdigt werden, und die Besatzung des Decks hielt zum Gedenken an sie eine Nachtwache. Die {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}Servitoren{/g} haben mindestens elf Brüche in der Außenhülle und mindestens drei in der Innenhülle registriert. Mit der gnädigen Erlaubnis meines Herrn werde ich mich bemühen zu retten, was noch zu retten ist. Der {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} weiß alles, begreift alles.
languages.original_text: My {mf|lord|lady}, it grieves me to report the demise of 27.61% of the blessed machine spirits entrusted to my care. Reactors 2 and 3 required expedited burials, and the deck's crew held a vigil in their memory. The {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitors{/g} have logged at least eleven breaches in the hull exterior, and at least three in the hull interior. With my {mf|lord|lady}'s gracious permission, I will endeavour to save what can still be saved. The {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} knows all, comprehends all.

languages.text: {mf|Mon seigneur|Ma dame}, j'ai le regret de vous informer de la mort de 27,61 % des esprits de la machine qui m'ont été confiés. Les réacteurs 2 et 3 ont dû faire l'objet de funérailles expéditives, et l'équipage du pont a procédé à une veillée en leur mémoire. Les {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitors{/g} ont enregistré au moins onze brèches dans la coque extérieure, et pas moins de trois dans la coque intérieure. Avec la gracieuse permission de Votre Seigneurie, je vais m'efforcer de sauver ce qui peut encore l'être. L'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g} sait tout et comprend tout.
languages.original_text: My {mf|lord|lady}, it grieves me to report the demise of 27.61% of the blessed machine spirits entrusted to my care. Reactors 2 and 3 required expedited burials, and the deck's crew held a vigil in their memory. The {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitors{/g} have logged at least eleven breaches in the hull exterior, and at least three in the hull interior. With my {mf|lord|lady}'s gracious permission, I will endeavour to save what can still be saved. The {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} knows all, comprehends all.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Mon seigneur|Ma dame}, j'ai le regret de vous informer de la mort de 27,61 % des esprits de la machine qui m'ont été confiés. Les réacteurs 2 et 3 ont dû faire l'objet de funérailles expéditives, et l'équipage du pont a procédé à une veillée en leur mémoire. Les {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitors{/g} ont enregistré au moins onze brèches dans la coque extérieure, et pas moins de trois dans la coque intérieure. Avec la gracieuse permission de Votre Seigneurie, je vais m'efforcer de sauver ce qui peut encore l'être. L'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g} sait tout et comprend tout.

languages.text: {mf|Lordum|Leydim}, himayem altındaki kutsanmış makine ruhlarının %27,61'inin vefatını size acı içinde bildiririm. 2. ve 3. Reaktörlerde hızlandırılmış definler gerekiyordu ve güverte mürettebatı, onların anısına bir ayin gerçekleştirdi. {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}Hizmetörler{/g}; gövdenin dış kısmında en az on bir, iç kısmındaysa en az üç gedik kaydetti. {mf|Lordumun|Leydimin} lütufkâr izniyle, kurtarılabilecek durumda olanları kurtarma girişiminde bulunacağım. {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih{/g} her şeyi bilir, her şeyin farkındadır.
languages.original_text: My {mf|lord|lady}, it grieves me to report the demise of 27.61% of the blessed machine spirits entrusted to my care. Reactors 2 and 3 required expedited burials, and the deck's crew held a vigil in their memory. The {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitors{/g} have logged at least eleven breaches in the hull exterior, and at least three in the hull interior. With my {mf|lord|lady}'s gracious permission, I will endeavour to save what can still be saved. The {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} knows all, comprehends all.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Lordum|Leydim}, himayem altındaki kutsanmış makine ruhlarının %27,61'inin yok olduğunu acı içinde bildirmeliyim. 2. ve 3. Reaktör'te hızlandırılmış cenazelere gereksinim duyuldu ve güverte mürettebatı, merhumların anısına ibadet ayini gerçekleştirdi. {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}Servitörler{/g}; gövdenin dış kısmında en az on bir, iç kısmındaysa en az üç gedik kaydetti. {mf|Lordumun|Leydimin} lütufkâr izniyle kurtarılabilecek durumda olanları kurtarma girişiminde bulunacağım. {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih{/g} her şeyi bilir, her şeyin farkındadır.
